Class MotionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuryshee.safehome.rpi.MotionController

  • public final class MotionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class interacts with the web camera, motion sensor and LED.
    Author:
    Ekaterina Kurysheva

    • Field Detail

      • formatOfImage

        public static java.lang.String formatOfImage
        The format of the saved photos.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MotionController

        public MotionController()
        Constructor sets the motion sensor and LED pin. Blinks three times to indicate that the program is ready for use.

    • Method Detail

      • isON

        public boolean isON()
        Getter for the property ON.
        Returns:
        true if the state of the program is "ON".

      • getStateString

        public java.lang.String getStateString()
        Returns the string specifying the state of the program.
        Returns:
        "on" or "off" accordingly.

      • takePhoto

        public void takePhoto()
        Sends the command to take a photo and save it into the directory set in the configuration file. Reports the path to the photo to the Main.photoPaths.

      • switchOff

        public void switchOff()
        Sets the current program mode to "OFF".. Blinks LED once to indicate switching OFF.

      • switchOn

        public void switchOn()
        Sets the current program mode to "ON". LED blinks two times to indicate setting ON.

      • blink

        public void blink()
        Blinks led once with HALF_SEC interval.
